plot: Penny down in luck and looking for that perfect guy. When she wishes for an intellectual guy and throws her penny in the water her wish comes true but not exactly the way she wanted. Neither do the other wishes.
title: Penny
plot_es: Penny down in luck and looking for that perfect guy. When she wishes for an intellectual guy and throws her penny in the water her wish comes true but not exactly the way she wanted. Neither do the other wishes.
